readable.title: 3533775651_9d7e93dacf
readable.content: A person in red is opening a red car 's door in a parking area . a woman gets out of a red car . Two people embrace outside of a red car at night in a brightly-lit city . Two people standing next to a red car are hugging in traffic with a brightly lit city scene behind them . Two people stand outside of a red car in the city and hug .
